about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a software engineer with over 7 years of experience building backend and full-stack solutions across industries like real estate tech, insurance platforms, and banking systems.
about.p2: I've worked on API integrations, backend services, cloud infrastructure, and internal tools using technologies such as TypeScript, Node.js, Python, React, and AWS. Whether it's improving system reliability, optimizing data pipelines, or maintaining large codebases, I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and collaborating closely with cross-functional teams.
about.p3: I value continuous learning and often share knowledge through documentation and team sessions. Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new technologies, reading engineering blogs, and taking walks to unwind.
about.p4: I'm currently looking for new opportunities where I can contribute my experience, grow alongside a strong team, and build impactful software.

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Implemented secure payment gateway and order management system.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management tool with real-time updates using Firebase. Features include drag-and-drop boards and user authentication.

projects.title: Personal Blog Engine
projects.description: A lightweight and fast blog engine built with Next.js and Markdown. Optimized for SEO and performance, with a clean and responsive design.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.p1: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of something amazing. Feel free to reach out!
